author: humbedooh
msg: add the loader image to some pages that can be slow to build.

author: rhuijben
msg: * subversion/libsvn_wc/wc_db_update_move.c
(check_node_shadowed): Use explicit arguments instead of baton.
(update_moved_away_node): Update caller.

author: ivan
msg: Fix mostly theoretical data corruption in log-addressing enabled FSFS
repositories when physical-to-logical index will be more than 4 GB on
32-bit platform.
* subversion/libsvn_fs_fs/index.c
(svn_fs_fs__p2l_index_append): Use proper type (apr_uint64_t) for local
variable that holds file size.

author: reschke
msg: OAK-2389 - optimize escape/encode not to encode characters >= 127, update tests (patch by Thomas Mueller)

author: rjung
msg: Merge r1650310 and r1650320 from trunk:
mod_ssl: Add SSLSessionTickets (on|off).
It controls the use of TLS session tickets (RFC 5077).
Default is unchanged (on).
Using session tickets without restarting the web server with
an appropriate frequency (e.g. daily) compromises perfect forward
secrecy. As long as we do not have a nice key management
there needs to be a way to deactivate the use of session tickets.
Submitted by: rjung
Reviewed by: rjung, covener, ylavic
Backported by: rjung
